snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo was once a loud supporter of ethics reform in the state capital, but lately, at a time of charges against multiple legislators, he seems conspicuously quiet.
abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column notes that New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo was once a loud supporter of ethics reform in the state capital, but lately, at a time of charges against multiple legislators, he seems conspicuously quiet.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo was once a loud supporter of ethics reform in the state capital, but lately, at a time of charges against multiple legislators, he seems conspicuously quiet.

headline.print_headline: Once a Vocal Champion of a Cleaner Albany, Cuomo Appears Plaintive
headline.seo: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo Seems Quiet on Ethics Reform Now
headline.main: Once a Vocal Champion of a Cleaner Albany, Cuomo Appears Plaintive
